name: Battle Mine Sweeper
description:
Feature

・ You like Simple Is Best!
No need to remember complicated rules at all.
All 4 types of items and 4 types of traps buried in the map.
Just infer the number of surrounding items and the number of traps displayed in the opened square.

・ But isn't there something like growing up and fighting?
understood.
Collect armed items and arm them so that you can fight.

・ Let's aim for the top!
That's right.
Let's aim for the best in the world.
We have prepared a weekly ranking.
It will be reset every week, so even if you can't do it last week, let's aim for the top this week.
